ygData.subject: RE: Lambent OPINIONS
ygData.msgSnippet: ... snip ... I agree.  That s why I ve been using my new tagline from time to time. Crier Sharpsong EverQuest - pretend it s a game.
ygData.messageBody:
... snip ...

I agree. That's why I've been using my new tagline from time to time.

Crier Sharpsong
EverQuest - pretend it's a game.

> people seem to get awfully worked up over a game... to the point of
> coming across rude to people, the game ceases to be UN-fun (actually -
> the game has always been fun for me - its some of the posts on this
> list that bother me). Anyway, that was what I was
> objecting to... NOT whether a person really does deserve or not deserve
> things etc.... Anyway - I have said enough on this (its a good thing that
> people don't HAVE to agree on things or this thread will never end).
>
> Brangwen
>
